segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicating the beginning of the message and identifying the consignment for which status is being requested.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date/time of the message and the dates, times and periods relating to the requested status or events.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place/location which applies to the consignment such as consignment origin and destination.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the requested status, e.g. customer reference number.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment identifying conveyance relating to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to the requested status or event such as a container.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify the parties related to the consignment.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party to the consignment such as a shipper, consignee, freight forwarder, broker.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to indicate contacts related to the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to provide information about specific consignments, e.g. included in a consolidation.

segment.name: Consignment information
segment.documentation: CNI, A segment to indicate a consignment (in a consolidation) using the reference number of its transport document.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate the date/time of the transport document of this consignment and the dates, times and periods relating to the requested status or events.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place/location which applies to the consignment such as consignment origin and destination.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the requested status, e.g. customer reference number/order.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment identifying conveyance relating to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to the requested status or event such as a container.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify the parties related to this consignment.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party to the consignment such as a shipper, consignee, freight forwarder, broker.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to indicate contacts related to the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.
